amendment.description: To state the sense of the Senate regarding procedures that ensure that fair and equitable resolution of labor integration issues in transactions for the combination of air carriers.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 500 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 500 proposed by Senator Bond. (consideration: CR S4771-4775, S4805-4806; text as Senate disagreed to House amendment: CR S4771) To state the sense of the Senate regarding procedures that ensure that fair and equitable resolution of labor integration issues in transactions for the combination of air carriers.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 500 proposed by Senator Bond.

reference.label: text as Senate disagreed to House amendment
